attributes.action: Call for a public enquiry into the grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: It’s seems there has been a cover up to the extent of the the grooming and abuse of these poor girls
attributes.background: Hold a public independent enquiry into the grooming gangs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
